desc: The home of new and used Vinyl, CDs, cassettes, music magazines, Record Store day exclusives, Indy exclusives, rare and hard to find vinyl. Based in Stroud, Gloucestershire. Trading Post records Stroud.

layout.text: Trading Post Records opened in 1977. We are an Independent Record Shop dealing in CD's, Records and DVD's. We are based in Stroud, Gloucestershire which is famous for Stroud Farmers Market, Stroud Brewery and Laurie Lee.
